details: Extends maintenance coverage beyond the complimentary period.
Covers oil changes, filters, tire rotations, and inspections.
Adds air filters, fluids, spark plugs, and more.
Services performed by factory-trained Hyundai technicians.
Coverage tailored for different driving conditions.
Repairs for breakdowns even if near a covered service area.
Services must be performed within a specific window.
limitations: Within 5k miles or 6 months of interval

details: Any extra-cost or upgraded parts used during service.
